text:
Hello everyone, is there a way to create associate different multiple crm objects at the same time? I see that to create a batch of associations with the v3 API I need to specify the "fromObjectType" and the "toObjectType" on the endpoint. But what I want to be able to do is associate a deal with a contact and a company in the same request.

Is this possible with the version 3 of the API or I have to use the legacy associations endpoint?

<@U22PKFRU5> I am not able to access this page where the implemetation of action_hook of a custom card might be explained in detail. Could you please give us any idea when it may be up again?

<http://developers-HubSpot-com.sandbox.hs-sites.com/docs-beta/crm/extensions?hs_preview=NdXihRvX-27422303162&__hstc=20629287.5016fb658ea141dba7afdea5220166c5.1612509530977.1612639329376.1612648145565.5&__hssc=20629287.5.1612648145565&__hsfp=2241081302#action-hooks|http://developers-HubSpot-com.sandbox.hs-sites.com/docs-beta/crm/extensions?hs_preview=NdXihRvX-2[…]hssc=20629287.5.1612648145565&__hsfp=2241081302>
Hey there, can you tell me where you saw that link? That will help me track down the correct page for you, and correct whatever resource had that link, so others dont run into the same issue
Nvm i see its in your screenshot. Taking a look
The content is actually on that page itself. See the “handling action hooks” section of that page.
I’m working on fixing those links right now
AH!! I thought it was something more. NVM. And thank you for replying!

Hi everyone. I'm a Junior BA and not a dev. Reading API specs and got few questions:
1. whether it is possible to connect one contact to many companies via API (our tool will be used by accountants, who will use it on for their clients, so initially we want to create a contact (accountant) and many associated companies (clients), who we will be contacting later.
2. Should we create a company first then the contact or it does not really matter?
Please assist or point to the right direction :slightly_smiling_face:
